body:
I did some digging around, and I don't think there is much that Shield can do about this. It almost seems like a Firefox bug. There isn't any extra space in the inner or outer HTML, or the code we use to generate this. Overall it's really puzzling.

I think the best we can do here is provide a copy button that will put the exact value directly on the clipboard.
